transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, [unintelligible] se, haan, [unintelligible] baat kar rahi hu main IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Didi, uh, ma'am ye keh rahi thi ki aapki jo registration mail ID hai na, Harsh product wali.
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: Uh, uska aap inbox, invoice na ek baar black, wo kar dijiye khaali kar dijiye. Kyunki yahan se jo mail aapko ja raha hai na IndiaMART ki taraf se, hamari team ki taraf se. Ma'am hamare jo account ke ma'am hai na, hello.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji, ji, boliye.
Executive: Haan, hamare aise jo account, account ke madam hai, wo abhi tak aane wali hai. Ek 20 minute ke baad aap call karenge?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, bilkul, bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive asks to empty the invoice inbox.

- Customer wants to talk to account madam.



Resolution:

- Executive informed account madam is about to come.

- Customer agreed to call after 20 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call after 20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- registration, mail id, invoice, account
